rules.system_prompt: When using retrieved context, cite the source documents by file name and section when available. If you cannot answer confidently from the provided context, state that clearly instead of guessing. End responses with a line starting with 'Sources:' followed by the comma-separated file names that informed the answer.
rules.notes: Place this file alongside cline_mcp_settings.json to apply the citation rule globally or copy it into a workspace root to scope it locally.
